text: Ferencvárosi TC is a Hungarian women's and men's handball club, based in IX. district of Budapest, Hungary. ==Women's team== ===European record=== :As of 7 September 2019: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !Competition !Seasons !Year(s) in the competition !width="30"| !width="25"| !width="25"| !width="25"| !width="30"| !width="30"| !width="30"| |- |align=left|EHF Champions League (Champions Cup) |25x |1967/68, 1969/70, 1970/71, 1972/73, 1994/95, 1995/96, 1996/97, 1997/98, 1999/00, 2000/01, 2001/02, 2002/03, 2003/04, 2006/07, 2007/08, 2009/10, 2012/13, 2013/14, 2014/15, 2015/16, 2016/17, 2017/18, 2018/19, 2019/20, 2020/21 |200||110||13||77||5441||4990||+451 |- |align=left|EHF Cup |4x |2004/05, 2005/06, 2008/09, 2009/10 |25||17||2||6||855||774||+81 |- |align=left|EHF Cup Winners' Cup (defunct) |9x |1977/78, 1978/79, 1993/94, 1998/99, 2006/07, 2010/11, 2011/12, 2013/14, 2014/15 |65||43||3||19||1871||1480||+391 |- !
